thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Alan

author: Alan
title: Alan
text: After a minor hicup with flights were greated at the airport and taken to collect the car, staff were very helpfull and paperwork was done quickly, only a minor hic-up with the first car as the cigarette light was broken so unable to use Sat Nav, quickly swopped to alt car with no issue. Only point to mention was the car was meant to have a full tank, this turned out to be a qtr tank which makes it harder to return in the same level of fuel.
